summary_of_actions: Created `AGENTS.md` to serve as a comprehensive guide for developers and agents.
Created `CONTEXT_TRANSFER.md` to establish best practices for handoffs.
Created this `AGENT_HISTORY.md` file to log major agent activities.
key_decisions: Established `uv run` as the standard for executing all development tools.
Defined the norm of performing `ruff` lint resolution at the end of a development cycle to reduce churn.
Formalized a structured format for plans and context transfer.
